description: The clip posted in February showed her singing and rapping a verse on the group’s song Good Side at MBS. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Singapore’s got talent: Singer Shazza’s video with pop duo Crash Adams gains her new fans worldwide
title_page: Singapore’s got talent: Singer Shazza’s video with pop duo Crash Adams gains her new fans worldwide | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – A rising name in the home-grown music scene, singer-songwriter Shazza found herself a much larger audience when a video of her with Canadian pop duo Crash Adams went viral worldwide in February.
Filmed at Marina Bay Sands (MBS), the clip of her singing and rapping a verse of the group’s song Good Side (2024) has since clocked over 21.8 million views on TikTok and 17.9 million views on YouTube.
